DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to compare the safety and efficacy of loteprednol etabonate to vehicle for the treatment of postoperative inflammation and pain following cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Loteprednol Etabonate Versus Vehicle for the Treatment of Inflammation and Pain Following Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects who are at least 18 years of age. Subjects who are candidates for routine, uncomplicated cataract surgery. Subjects who have known hypersensitivity or contraindication to the study drug or components. Subjects with a severe/serious ocular condition, or any other unstable medical condition, that in the investigator's opinion may preclude study treatment or followup. Subjects with elevated intraocular pressure (>/=21mm Hg), uncontrolled glaucoma, or being treated for glaucoma in the study eye. Subjects who are monocular or have pinholed Snellen visual acuity (VA) 20/200 or worse in the nonstudy eye.
